subject: Parent-Teacher Conference
content: Discussed Emma's progress in mathematics. Parents are supportive and willing to provide additional help at home.

subject: Homework Reminder
content: Sent reminder about upcoming science project deadline to both parents.

subject: Attendance Concern
content: Called Mr. Williams regarding Liam's recent absences. Family had medical emergency, excused absences approved.

subject: Academic Achievement
content: Contacted parents to congratulate them on Olivia's excellent performance on recent exams.

subject: Behavioral Update
content: Positive update on Noah's classroom participation and leadership skills development.

subject: Assignment Discussion
content: Discussed Ava's creative writing assignment with Mrs. Miller. Arranged for additional writing resources.
